general.about:
Senior Product Designer working with business with the goal of creating unique and people-friendly digital experiences.

Over the last 10 years, I helped design $20M+ ARR companies with $150M+ valuation from scratch and raise over $50M in venture capital.

I worked with: Solana, Pokémon GO,... and more

Most of my latest work is under NDA, so I collected different designs from different projects [HERE](http://figma.com/file/701DxkeTLOGtwtqGrq0hoS/Nidal-Work-Samples?node-id=0:1)

projects.heading: Kral Team
projects.description:
In early 2022, I decided to start a design team to help SaaS startups save money and make money by providing our expertise as a product design team for a flat monthly fee.

We partnered with 8 SaaS startups so far, and the results were pretty phenomenal. We helped startups achieve a +150m valuation while saving them 65% of the cost of hiring one full-time senior product designer.

My mission with this team is to be the "SaaS Design Partner."
projects.title: Kral Team

writing.description: Design thinking is a problem-solving approach that involves understanding the needs of users, generating ideas, prototyping, and testing…
writing.title: Design Thinking? Your Beginners Guide

workExperience.heading: Product Design Consultant/Advisor at Solana, Pokèmon GO, Letswork, Eversify, Lotus, Blee, Raasel, Brandable, STYLUS
workExperience.description:
I helped clients fulfill their design goals through workshops, brainstorming sessions, and milestone-building.

I did this by auditing applications, websites, and other digital products to identify places where the design can be improved upon.\
\
And even designing the product myself.
workExperience.title: Product Design Consultant/Advisor
workExperience.company: Solana, Pokèmon GO, Letswork, Eversify, Lotus, Blee, Raasel, Brandable, STYLUS

workExperience.heading: Head of Design at TOKI
workExperience.description: The next generation of retention, community, and loyalty for e-commerce brands. Built on the blockchain.
workExperience.title: Head of Design

workExperience.heading: Founding Product Designer at Topsort
workExperience.description: Topsort is an auction-powered API that accelerates your marketplace growth, from multi-brand retailers and marketplaces, to create better relevancy, margin, and user happiness.
workExperience.title: Founding Product Designer

workExperience.heading: Senior Product Designer at Ureed
workExperience.description: Ureed.com is a platform that connects expert freelancers with employers looking for professional services in content creation and translation.
workExperience.title: Senior Product Designer

workExperience.heading: Design Lead at Pickmeup
workExperience.description: Pickmeup allows you to book a safe and reliable ride in minutes using your smartphone. It uses GPS technology to directly connect passengers to nearby drivers in just a few seconds. Our mobile App is extremely simple and very user-friendly. You can sign up within seconds and start booking rides immediately.
workExperience.title: Design Lead

volunteering.heading: Design Mentore at ADPList
volunteering.description: ADPList is a community based on connection and inclusivity — a platform where people can find, book, and meet mentors around the world. At ADPList, we believe in inspiring meaningful conversations led by our mentors.
volunteering.title: Design Mentore

education.heading: Self-taught at Internet
education.description: Internet is the place where I found my passion for design. Since 2012, it helped me shape my career path and build knowledge about things that I enjoy and like without limits.

education.heading: Computer Science BA at Algiers University
education.description: My background in computer science makes my collaboration, and communication with the engineering team easier and more productive.

certifications.heading: Design Sprinter from AJ&Smart
certifications.description:
Innovation and product development demystified and de-risked.
I help businesses do more valuable work, faster.

Right from the start, we help establish clarity, set priorities, make decisions, and bring concepts to life that users love and businesses value.
certifications.name: Design Sprinter
